description: For the past few months, Ophelia has been talking people down from ledges, offering them kind words and building them back up after they’ve been bullied and belittled by their viewers, their dates or even their own mothers on social media platforms. It’s her special combination of Southern, sweeter-than-tea charm and gentle, motherly wisdom that makes Ophelia a magnetic yet soothing online presence — especially amid a tough time like this, when a kind word can be the sole force that propels you through the day. Her unique uplift apparel is a reflection of her kindness and how she wants everyone to be viewed.
